title: Retro Pet Trends
description: Pet ownership trends and famous pets through decades

questions.question: What novelty 'pet,' consisting of a smooth stone in a cardboard box with air holes, became a massive fad in 1975?

Which president had a famous pair of beagles named Him and Her at the White House?
What type of small, low-maintenance pet in a bowl became a popular first pet for children in the 1950s and 1960s?
Which cat food brand used the famous advertising slogan 'Meow Meow Meow Meow' in its catchy jingle starting in the 1970s?
What famous TV horse, known for being able to 'talk,' starred in a sitcom from 1961 to 1966?
